Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.tui

Class ClientUtil

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.tui.ClientUtil
public class ClientUtil extends Object
ClientUtil is the class that facilitates TUIs printing

      Parameters:
      lineCoordinate - the line in which the str is to be printed.
      columnCoordinate - the column in which the str is to be printed.
      str - the array of strings to print.

    • printToLineColumn

      public static void printToLineColumn(int lineCoordinate, int columnCoordinate, String[][] matrix)
      Prints a matrix in a specific lineCoordinate and columnCoordinate. It's used to convert cards, generally string matrices.
      Parameters:
      lineCoordinate - the line in which the matrix is to be printed.
      columnCoordinate - the column in which the matrix is to be printed
      matrix - of strings.

    • buildPlayground

      public static DrawablePlayground buildPlayground(ClientPlayground clientPlayground, Position currentOffset, Position requestedOffset) throws InvalidCardRepresentationException, InvalidCardDimensionException, FittablePlaygroundException
      Method used to build the drawable playground.
      Parameters:
      clientPlayground - of reference
      currentOffset - respect to the centered start print (is the position that will leave exactly half tiles out) in both directions
      requestedOffset - to add to the current offset
      Throws:
      InvalidCardRepresentationException
      InvalidCardDimensionException
      FittablePlaygroundException

    • maxPlaygroundScreenPositions

      public static int[] maxPlaygroundScreenPositions()
      Number of cards that will fit the screen

    • printPlayground

      public static Position printPlayground(ClientPlayground clientPlayground, Position currentOffset, Position requestedOffset) throws UndrawablePlaygroundException
      Method used to print the playground. In addition, returns the new offset
      Parameters:
      clientPlayground - of reference
      currentOffset - of the playground
      requestedOffset - related to current playground position
      Throws:
      UndrawablePlaygroundException

    • drawAvailablePosition

      public static String[][] drawAvailablePosition(Position pos)
      Draws the card located in pos The passed position must be an available position
      Parameters:
      pos - available position
      Returns:
      a card containing of the position

      public static void printDecks(ClientFace resourceDeckTop, ClientFace goldenDeckTop)
      Prints the golden and resource decks on the screen.
      Parameters:
      resourceDeckTop - the back of the first resource card found in the resource deck.

      Parameters:
      objectives - the objective cards to print.
      area - the screen area.

    • printPlayground

      public static Position printPlayground(ClientPlayground playground, Position currOffset) throws UndrawablePlaygroundException
      Decides whether the currOffset is exaggerated or not and if it is, corrects it and returns the upper left position from where the printing will start
      Parameters:
      playground - of reference
      currOffset - of the playground
      Returns:
      the adjusted position
      Throws:
      UndrawablePlaygroundException - if an error occurs during the playground representation design

    • printFirstScreen

      public static void printFirstScreen()
      Method used to have just the title in the middle of the screen
